name: WhiteLily 2：梦醒少女
description:
♠Wonderful plot♠

    "Waking up Girl" was created by the original team who made "Princess Lili", and improved the quality of the plot. Not only did the plot maintain its original high quality and excitement, but Its logic is also more reasonable and organized.

    In addition, the character dialogue in this game, from the aspects of readability and layout, considers the reader’s psychological and visual aesthetics, and is optimized, which greatly reduces the fatigue when reading text and turns reading into a very happy thing. ♪(^∇^*)

♣Sneak and puzzle gameplay♣

    In this game, the player will use a special anesthetic needle to sneak attack and anesthetize the enemy. Players need to prevent themselves from being discovered by the enemy as much as possible. At the same time, they need to solve various puzzles to achieve a multiplier effect. (≧∇≦)ﾉ

♥High-quality art and music♥

    All the pictures in this game are original by artist Chi Yin Ling, and the style is exquisite and unified. At the same time, the music in our game has also been carefully selected. Every piece of music is particularly good. Welcome everyone to try!

♦Add no plot mode♦

    In addition to the original plot puzzle gameplay, our game has also added a "no plot mode". This mode only retains the game's puzzle solving, stealth and other non-story content, which not only simplifies the game process, but also satisfies more players' preferences.

★Character introduction★
